Edges-Ranger -- Female Human Heroic Ranger
Attributes (11 Points):
Agility: d8 Smarts: d4 Spirit: d10 Strength: d8 Vigor: d12
Attribute Notes:
Adaptability: +1 Attribute Points
Armor Restriction: -4 Agility w/heavy armor or shield
Skills (18 Points):
Academics: (sma) d4 Fighting: (agi) d8 Stealth: (agi) d4
Athletics: (agi) d8 Notice: (sma) d4 Survival: (sma) d6
Boating: (agi) d4 Performance: (spi) d6 Taunt: (sma) d4
Common Knowledge: (sma) d4 Persuasion: (spi) d4-1
Faith: (spi) d4 Shooting: (agi) d6
Languages: Abyssal; Aklo; Common
Skill Notes:
Mean: -1 Persuasion
Ace: Ignores 2 penalty points on Boating, Driving, and Piloting; may spend Benny to Soak vehicle damage
Armor Restriction: -4 Agility-based skills w/heavy armor or shield
Danger Sense: +2 Notice (surprise)/Rolls Notice-2 in circumstances not normally subject to Notice
Favored Enemy: May reroll failed Survival to track 2 chosen creature type
Size: 0 Alignment: Neutral Deity: Erastil (Good)
Advances: 12 Improvement Points: 28 Improvement Points Allocation: Attribute: 10; Edge: 12; Skill: 6
Features
Edges (8 points): Ace; Common Bond; Danger Sense; Fleet-Footed; Master Hunter; Mystic Powers (Ranger); Quarry; Ranger Hindrances: Illiterate; Mean; Vengeful; Vow Human Features: Adaptability
Feature Notes:
Adaptability: +1 Edge Points
Quarry: Gains additional Favored Enemy and Favored Terrain
Ranger: Has Armor Restriction, Favored Enemy, Favored Terrain, and Wilderness Stride features
Common Bond: Communication allows transfer of Bennies to allies
Illiterate: Cannot read or write
Master Hunter: Successful attacks on favored enemy inflict +d6 damage
Mean: Ill-tempered and disagreeable
Vengeful: Seeks revenge legally
Vow: Has broad restrictions on behavior and decisions
Combat
Parry: 7 (1) Cover: 0 Toughness: 10 (2) Pace/Run: 8/+d8
Armor: Leather Jacket Shield: Light Shield Weapons: Dagger (d8+d4 R3"); Light Repeating Crossbow (2d6 R10"); Short Sword (d8+d6); Unarmed (d8+d0)
Combat Notes:
Fighting Parry Modifier: +4 Parry
Fleet-Footed: +2 Pace/+1 Run step
Vigor Toughness Modifier: +6
Favored Enemy: May reroll failed attacks against 2 chosen creature type
Favored Terrain: Gains additional Action Card in 2 chosen terrain
Wilderness Stride: Ignores movement penalties for difficult ground
Arcana
Power Points: 10
Powers:
Beast Friend: (1/Size PP Ench) R4" Target can speak with and control beast actions for 10 min (+2 PP Affects magical beasts; +1 PP Effects last for 30 min; +1 PP Target can use beast's senses)
Boost/Lower Trait: (2 PP Tran) R4" Target gains +1 trait step (Raise +2) for 5 rd or suffers -1 trait step (Raise -2) (Spirit recovers 1 step each rd) (+1 PP/additional target; +2 PP Target gains free reroll 1/rd (Raise 1/action) or suffers -2 penalty; +1 PP Spirit-2)
Entangle: (2 PP Tran) R4" Restrains target (Raise binds; Athletics or breaking Hardness 5 frees) (+2/+3 PP 2"/3" radius; +2/+4 PP Inflicts 2d4/2d6 damage; +1 PP Entangling material has Hardness 10)
Warrior's Gift: (4 PP Conj) R4" Target gains combat edge effects for 5 rd (+1 PP/additional target; +4 PP Target gains 2 combat edges)
Common Power Modifiers: +1 PP Adaptable Caster; +1/+2/+3 PP Armor Piercing; +2 PP Fatigue; +1 PP Glow/Shroud; +2 PP Heavy Weapon; +1 PP Hinder/Hurry; +2 PP Lingering Damage; +1/+2 PP Dbl/Tpl Range; +1 PP Selective
Arcana Notes: Mystic Powers (Ranger): 10 Power Points/May cast Beast Friend, self Boost Trait (Athletics, Fighting, or Shooting), Entangle, and self Warrior's Gift w/automatic success (+2 Power Points for raise)
